name: tryout
content:
tryout noun [C]
(COMPETITION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a competition for a position on a team or a part in a play: Tryouts for the team will be held next week.
tryout noun [C]
(TEST USE)
a test of something to see if it works well: After a barefoot tryout, she concluded that the carpet passed the softness test.
